Articles.Content:
Hi

I can't seem to build fairings/protective shells. I can't close the fairing even though the text is written in green. When I click LMB to close the fairing, the fairing still moves around when I move my mouse around. What is happening??? It is getting really frustrating.

Thanks

A picture or (even better in this case especially) video would do wonders here.

upload to Imgur and link here to the picture and someone will hopefully see what's up.
